before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"1nsqm","text":"Prepare the plates:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmpgv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4od5b","text":"- Coat plates with poly-L-Lysine   at room temperature or at least   at 37Â°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":33,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":67,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e89hp","text":"- Wash thoroughly with distilled water three times. Let it dry under the hood in the dark.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"o432","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56l4k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8u9hi","text":"Prepare the following solutions: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":31}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cq8rj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cn73","text":"- Dissection medium: 10mM HEPES pH7.3 , 0.1% D-glucose, 0.11mg/ml Sodium pyruvate in HBSS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f75gv","text":"- DNase solution: one vial of DNAse in   of BME.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9a73r","text":"- Papain solution: one vial of Papain in   of BME plus   of DNase solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":55,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"828ut","text":"- Trypsin inhibitor solution: 15.5mg/ml in BME. Filter the solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c2v94","text":"- Stop solution:   of DNase solution,   of Trypsin inhibitor solution in   of BME.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":2,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":17,"length":1},{"key":6,"offset":38,"length":1},{"key":7,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5j63b","text":"- 10/10 solution: Trypsin inhibitor 10ug/ml and BSA 10ug/ml in BME. Filter the solution.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":2,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8l6f4","text":"- Plating medium:   B27 supplement,   L-Glutamine,   Pen/Strep,   N2 supplement in   Neurobasal. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":2,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[{"key":8,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":9,"offset":36,"length":1},{"key":10,"offset":51,"length":1},{"key":11,"offset":64,"length":1},{"key":12,"offset":83,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"55fb7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"08DDBB80145C11EE95A9D96E21E59E7A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"0CDE8340145C11EE95A9D96E21E59E7A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"10":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"0BCAACD0145D11EE95A9D96E21E59E7A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"11":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"2485DA10145D11EE95A9D96E21E59E7A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"12":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"2B095510145D11EE95A9D96E21E59E7A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"BCD3B5DA145A11EE8B860A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"BCD3B681145A11EE8B860A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"4":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"BCD3B835145A11EE8B860A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"5":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"F2DF59C0145A11EE95A9D96E21E59E7A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"6":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"600","error":false,"guid":"FFB813D0145A11EE95A9D96E21E59E7A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"7":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5.4","error":false,"guid":"0D3683C0145B11EE95A9D96E21E59E7A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"8":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"FCD63EB0145C11EE95A9D96E21E59E7A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"9":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"125","error":false,"guid":"02DD36B0145D11EE95A9D96E21E59E7A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"a1q53","text":"This protocol describes how to obtain primary neuronal cultures from postnatal mice (P0-P1). It can be used to obtain pure cortical neurons cultures or stratal-cortical neurons and dopaminergic-cortical neurons co-cultures. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: Aligning Science Across Parkinson's [ASAP-020600] through the Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson's Research (MJFF)

keywords: ASAPCRN,co-cultures,primary neurons,striatal-cortical neuronal cultures,dopaminergic-cortical neuronal cultures

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b08ng","text":"Snip the tissues into smaller pieces and place them in Papain solution. Use around   of Papain solution for 5 SN, around   of Papain solution for 5 striata and around   of Papain solution for 5-6 cortices. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":83,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":121,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":167,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c4um6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"07788A60145511EE95A9D96E21E59E7A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"11B22F90145511EE95A9D96E21E59E7A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"33293BA0145511EE95A9D96E21E59E7A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9st0b","text":"Incubate at 37Â°C for   and mix by inversion every  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2400,"guid":"BDF86330145211EEBDDED357E451565A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"C7071CF0145211EEBDDED357E451565A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9kugt","text":"Spin in swing bucket rotor at 1000rpm for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"er6tp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"BAA3C480145311EE95A9D96E21E59E7A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6qvet","text":"Dissect the cortices, the striatum and the substantia nigra (SN) in cold dissection medium, carefully removing the meninges ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":64,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3jvq9","text":"Tap the tubes to move the pellet and add STOP solution. Add   for 5 SN,   for 5 striata and around   for 3 cortices. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":72,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":99,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4jdee","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"FD2C7930145511EE95A9D96E21E59E7A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"030A6560145611EE95A9D96E21E59E7A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"1A397460145611EE95A9D96E21E59E7A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cao1h","text":"Take the supernatant and add to 10/10 solution drop-by-drop (use a volume of 10/10 solution that is equal to the supernatant volume)  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4pj5f","text":"Discard the supernatant and resuspend in Neurobasal complete medium with AraC. Use   of medium to resuspend 5 striata and 3 cortices. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":83,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2u00d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"E2184B50145611EE95A9D96E21E59E7A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a0s2d","text":"Count cortical and striatal cells with trypan blue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"66u1q","text":"Plate 500000 cells/well in 24wells-plate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmh3b","text":"For striatal-cortical co-culture plate a ratio of 1:2 striatum:cortex. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9sfrq","text":"For SN-cortical co-culture plate one well for each SN and around 500000 cortical neurons/well and also add GDNF to the medium. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"tkau","text":"Replace half medium about every 7 days by collecting conditioned medium from cells and mixing with fresh complete medium in a ratio of 1:1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
